explanation: [0-0] In a forest, there are two caves that burrow deep into the ground, extending from the soil above to the rocks below.

[0-5] Outside the cave on the left, a person in blue clothes uses a hoe to break the rocks beneath their feet, revealing diamonds. On the right, a person in a green shirt also uses a hoe to break the rocks beneath their feet but uncovers coal instead. Then, the person in green, realizing the other person has unearthed diamonds, breaks through the soil between them and switches caves with the person in blue. The person in blue, dejected, moves to the other side, unaware that beneath the diamonds lies yellow magma, while beneath their previous coal lies diamonds as well.
